description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国少将，曾任北京军区参谋长。因其战功卓著和鲜明个性而被称为“传奇人物”。
description.en: Founding Major General of the People's Liberation Army, former Chief of Staff of the Beijing Military Region. Known as a 'legendary figure' for his outstanding military achievements and distinctive personality.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群众组织。
description.en: A mass organization of advanced youth led by the Communist Party of China.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间创建和领导的军队。
description.en: The armed forces founded and led by the Communist Party of China between 1927 and 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部长，在庐山会议后遭到批判。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China and former Minister of National Defense, who was criticized after the Lushan Conference.

en: 3rd Army Group of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，由彭德怀指挥。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, commanded by Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，红十五军团的指挥官。
description.en: A Senior General of the People's Liberation Army and commander of the 15th Army Group of the Red Army.

en: 15th Army Group of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，由徐海东指挥。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, commanded by Xu Haidong.

description.zh-cn: 1934年至1936年间，中国工农红军进行的战略大转移。
description.en: The strategic military retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army from 1934 to 1936.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军的主力部队之一，后改编为第四野战军。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, later reorganized into the Fourth Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一个军，锺伟曾任军长。
description.en: An army of the People's Liberation Army, once commanded by Zhong Wei.

description.zh-cn: 1949年发生于湖南的一场战役，锺伟指挥的解放军部队在此战中被中华民国国军击败。
description.en: A battle that took place in Hunan in 1949, where the PLA forces commanded by Zhong Wei were defeated by the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1947年间的国家武装力量。
description.en: The national armed forces of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军上将，桂系将领，在青树坪战役中击败锺伟。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army and a commander of the Guangxi clique, who defeated Zhong Wei in the Battle of Qingshuping.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, governed by the Communist Party of China.

en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的将官军衔之一。
description.en: A general officer rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的七个大军区之一。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中国共产党召开的一次重要会议，会上彭德怀受到错误批判。
description.en: An important meeting held by the Communist Party of China in 1959, during which Peng Dehuai was wrongly criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，林彪反革命集团案主犯之一。
description.en: A general of the PLA Air Force and one of the principal defendants in the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共中央副主席、国防部长，后被定为反革命集团首领。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of National Defense, later designated as the leader of a counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团卫生部干部，在长征途中因临阵脱逃被钟伟执行战场纪律枪决。
description.en: An official of the Health Department of the 1st Red Army Group, who was executed by Zhong Wei for desertion during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，曾在军委扩大会议上逮捕钟伟。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Liberation Army, who arrested Zhong Wei during an enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省负责农业与农村经济发展的政府部门。
description.en: The government department of Anhui Province responsible for agriculture and rural economic development.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场大规模政治运动，对社会造成了巨大破坏。
description.en: A large-scale political movement in China from 1966 to 1976 that caused immense social devastation.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military leading organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军负责政治工作的最高领导机关。
description.en: Formerly the highest leading organ for political work in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，曾在一场战斗中与钟伟因是否撤退发生冲突。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Liberation Army, who had a conflict with Zhong Wei over whether to retreat during a battle.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军防空军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军防空军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的军种，后与空军合并。
description.en: A former service branch of the PLA, later merged into the Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广西军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广西军区

description.zh-cn: 锺伟是湖南平江人。
description.en: Zhong Wei was a native of Pingjiang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 1929年加入中国共产主义青年团。
description.en: Joined the Communist Youth League of China in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1929年参加中国工农红军。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1931年转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Became a member of the Communist Party of China in 1931.

position.zh-cn: 连指导员，团政委，师政治部主任
position.en: Company Political Instructor, Regiment Political Commissar, Division Political Department Director

description.zh-cn: 曾在彭德怀的红三军团担任连指导员，团政委，师政治部主任等职。
description.en: Served in Peng Dehuai's 3rd Red Army Group as a company political instructor, regiment political commissar, and division political department director.

description.zh-cn: 锺伟曾在彭德怀指挥的红三军团任职。
description.en: Zhong Wei served in the 3rd Red Army Group commanded by Peng Dehuai.

position.zh-cn: 连指导员，团政委，师政治部主任
position.en: Company Political Instructor, Regiment Political Commissar, Division Political Department Director

description.zh-cn: 曾在徐海东的红十五军团担任连指导员，团政委，师政治部主任等职。
description.en: Served in Xu Haidong's 15th Red Army Group as a company political instructor, regiment political commissar, and division political department director.

description.zh-cn: 锺伟曾在徐海东指挥的红十五军团任职。
description.en: Zhong Wei served in the 15th Red Army Group commanded by Xu Haidong.

description.zh-cn: 锺伟参加了长征。
description.en: Zhong Wei participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战中，担任东北野战军第二纵队第五师师长、第十二纵队司令等职务。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, he served as the commander of the 5th Division of the 2nd Column and commander of the 12th Column of the Northeast Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 锺伟在东北野战军时期于林彪麾下任职。
description.en: Zhong Wei served under Lin Biao during his time in the Northeast Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 在1949年的青树坪战役中，桂系将领张淦设下埋伏圈，击败了锺伟指挥的部队。
description.en: In the 1949 Battle of Qingshuping, Guangxi clique general Zhang Gan set up an ambush and defeated the troops commanded by Zhong Wei.

description.zh-cn: 锺伟指挥的第四十九军第一四六师在青树坪战役中被中华民国国军击败。
description.en: The 146th Division of the 49th Army, commanded by Zhong Wei, was defeated by the National Revolutionary Army in the Battle of Qingshuping.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，中华人民共和国授予锺伟少将军衔以及二级八一勋章、二级独立自由勋章、一级解放勋章。
description.en: In 1955, the People's Republic of China awarded Zhong Wei the rank of Major General, as well as the Second Class Order of August 1, the Second Class Order of Independence and Freedom, and the First Class Order of Liberation.

description.zh-cn: 1955年被授予少将军衔。
description.en: Was awarded the rank of Major General in 1955.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广西军区
中国人民解放军防空军

position.en: Chief of Staff of the Headquarters

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议后的军委扩大会议上，锺伟公开站出来为彭德怀辩护，反驳吴法宪等人的攻击。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission after the Lushan Conference in 1959, Zhong Wei publicly stood up to defend Peng Dehuai, refuting the attacks from Wu Faxian and others.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年军委扩大会议上揭发彭德怀身背“血债”。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission in 1959, he accused Peng Dehuai of having a 'blood debt'.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年军委扩大会议上，林彪插话支持对彭德怀的攻击。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission in 1959, Lin Biao interjected to support the attacks on Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 长征途中，一军团卫生部干部杨兴仁临阵逃跑并策动他人反水，被负责收容任务的钟伟抓获并执行战场纪律枪决。
description.en: During the Long March, Yang Xingren, an official from the Health Department of the 1st Army Group, deserted and incited others to defect. He was captured by Zhong Wei, who was in charge of straggler collection, and executed under battlefield discipline.

description.zh-cn: 在军委扩大会议上，因锺伟力挺彭德怀，萧华当场下令将其带上手铐并隔离审查。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, after Zhong Wei defended Peng Dehuai, Xiao Hua ordered him to be handcuffed and placed in solitary confinement on the spot.

description.zh-cn: 在军委扩大会议事件后，锺伟被撤销领导职务，下放到安徽省农业厅任副厅长。
description.en: After the incident at the enlarged CMC meeting, Zhong Wei was removed from his leadership position and demoted to Deputy Director of the Anhui Provincial Department of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间，锺伟受到严重迫害，曾被造反派装入麻袋殴打并投入江中，后侥幸存活。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhong Wei was severely persecuted. He was once put into a sack, beaten, and thrown into a river by a rebel faction, but he managed to survive.

description.zh-cn: 1980年12月24日，中央军委为锺伟平反。
description.en: On December 24, 1980, the Central Military Commission rehabilitated Zhong Wei.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 1982年8月，总政治部批准给予锺伟大军区副职待遇离休。
description.en: In August 1982, the General Political Department approved Zhong Wei's retirement with the benefits of a deputy-commander of a major military region.

description.zh-cn: 在一次战斗中，部队陷入埋伏，时任兵团副司令的陈伯钧主张撤退，但军长钟伟坚决反对，并拔枪顶住陈伯钧，阻止其下令撤退。
description.en: During a battle where their troops were ambushed, Chen Bojun, then deputy commander of the army group, advocated for a retreat. However, Army Commander Zhong Wei strongly opposed it, preventing the retreat order by drawing his pistol on Chen Bojun.
